QuestData.Title: Reverse Tinkering
QuestData.Description:
The sentry bots here are definitely of gnomish make. If the creator had any sort of proper education, each machine should have some sort of serial code on it.
And if they've been properly documented, I might be able to use those codes to track that gnome down.
Do you think you could bring a few of them back to me?
QuestData.RewardText: I'll have to send these back to Ironforge and we'll see if they can find anything.
